trans-unit.source: Use the `CreateProperty` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: Use o `CreateProperty` elemento no arquivo de projeto para criar e executar essa tarefa.

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [CreateProperty Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações de uso e de parâmetro, consulte [tarefa CreateProperty](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateProperty"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateProperty"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if task execution succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a execução da tarefa for bem-sucedida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value to copy to the new property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor para copiar para a nova propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The value to copy to the new property
trans-unit.target: O valor para copiar para a nova propriedade

trans-unit.source: Contains the same value as the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateProperty.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: Contém o mesmo valor que o <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateProperty.Value*>propriedade.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateProperty.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Use this property only when you want to avoid having the output property set by [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] when it skips the enclosing target because the outputs are up-to-date.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade somente quando você deseja evitar que a propriedade de saída definida por [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] quando ela ignora o delimitador de destino porque as saídas estão atualizadas.

trans-unit.source: The same value as the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateProperty.Value*> property.
